pipelines.name: extract_occupant
pipelines.sql: SELECT occupant_id, name, email, phone, address FROM occupant

pipelines.name: extract_apartment
pipelines.sql: SELECT apartment_id, tower, floor, unit, type, area FROM apartment

pipelines.name: extract_contract
pipelines.sql: SELECT contract_id, apartment_id, occupant_id, start_date, end_date, amount, type, status FROM contract

pipelines.name: extract_invoice
pipelines.sql: SELECT invoice_id, contract_id, due_date, amount, type, status FROM invoice

pipelines.name: extract_payment
pipelines.sql: SELECT payment_id, invoice_id, payment_date, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payment

pipelines.name: load_occupant
pipelines.sql: INSERT INTO occupant SELECT * FROM extract_occupant

pipelines.name: load_apartment
pipelines.sql: INSERT INTO apartment SELECT * FROM extract_apartment

pipelines.name: load_contract
pipelines.sql: INSERT INTO contract SELECT * FROM extract_contract

pipelines.name: load_invoice
pipelines.sql: INSERT INTO invoice SELECT * FROM extract_invoice

pipelines.name: load_payment
pipelines.sql: INSERT INTO payment SELECT * FROM extract_payment
